title: The Dragon's tears
creator_credit: John Korty, Contemproary Films and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: An animated adaptation of Hirosuke Hamada’s story of a little boy’s fearless act of inviting a dragon to his birthday party. Utilizes Japanese-style watercolour and art work. Narrated by Robert Morse. Suitable for lower and middle primary levels.
